title: Wall Street-Treasury Department Revolving Door Network
description: Document the systematic revolving door between major investment banks (Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan, Citigroup) and Treasury Department/Federal Reserve positions from 1970s-present
research_notes: Focus on Treasury Secretaries and key officials from Goldman Sachs, Citigroup, JPMorgan. Include regulatory decisions that benefited former employers. Key figures: Robert Rubin, Hank Paulson, Tim Geithner, Steven Mnuchin, Janet Yellen (Federal Reserve), Jerome Powell connections.
next_steps: Map career paths between Wall Street and Treasury/Fed positions, analyze policy decisions that benefited financial industry, document lobbying connections and regulatory outcomes
